label: Drug Delivery System
definition: Formulation/device-like systems that provide sustained or controlled drug release from an injection site (e.g., depots, microspheres, liposomes, hydrogels, liquid crystals, nanosuspensions).

label: Half-Life Extension Strategy
definition: Molecular strategies that extend the drug's systemic half-life without relying on a depot (e.g., PEGylation, PASylation, Fc/albumin fusions, lipidation, XTEN, glyco-engineering).
